tool_description: Unlimited Two Way Global SMS API | Send More Spend Less | Subscription-based | Highly Affordable as low as $5
name: SpewHub
title: SpewHub

api_list.name: Sending SMS (Test API)
api_list.description:
Try the system using the test endpoint to send sms to valid phone numbers. 
The Test endpoint allows you to send a maximum of 30 (thirty) messages per day to 4 (four) verified phone numbers. You can modify and replace any of the four test phone numbers, but any new phone number resulting from the modification or replacement of an existing test phone number must be verified before you can send a message to that phone number. To use the test account, create a license key on [https://spewhub.com/dashboard](https://spewhub.com/dashboard).    The subscriptions include $5/hour, $15 /day and $300/month.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spewhub.p.rapidapi.com/api/sms/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spewhub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sending Broadcast SMS (Broadcast API)
api_list.description: Send Unlimited SMS with a subscribed account. To use the Broadcast API, create a license key on [https://spewhub.com/dashboard](https://spewhub.com/dashboard).  The subscriptions include $5/hour, $15 /day and $300/month.
